GET /api/.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with the request article within

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all the comments related to the specified article_id

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of objects - with username, name and avatar_url

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: allows the user to send a comment which will will be returned as confirmation

exampleResponse.body: Ey up lad fancy a jar?
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Will allow the user to either up vote or down vote an article
